UnicodeForUs

  • Home
  • Characters

UnicodeForUs is the repository of fun unicode characters that belongs to everyone!
(By which I mean it's Creative Commons licensed.)

  • Experience thrilling unicode characters such as ☃, ★, ☁, and ✈!
  • Fork the repo and submit a pull request to add your favorites!
  • Find the characters you need in search when you need them, forever!
Explore unicode characters now →
